title: Cancer: A mutation that breaks gene interplay in 3D

title_detail.value: Cancer: A mutation that breaks gene interplay in 3D

summary: Scientists have discovered how a mutated gene can affect the three-dimensional interactions of genes in the cell, leading to various forms of cancer.

summary_detail.value: Scientists have discovered how a mutated gene can affect the three-dimensional interactions of genes in the cell, leading to various forms of cancer.
